results.title: Romi Stock In Focus: Can Indústrias Romi S.A. Turn A Quiet Tape Into A Breakout?
results.snippet: Brazilian machinery maker Indústrias Romi S.A. has been trading in a tight range, with muted volume and little fresh news.
